languages.text: "Наш побег — спектакль, которому дали ход силы много выше нашего помощника. И я бы хотела знать цену, которую мы должны за это заплатить".
"Our escape is a show that was staged by forces far greater than our helper. I would like to know the price we will have to pay for it."
languages.original_text: "Наш побег — спектакль, которому дали ход силы много выше нашего помощника. И я бы хотела знать цену, которую мы должны за это заплатить".

traits.locale_text: "Our escape is a show that was staged by forces far greater than our helper. I would like to know the price we will have to pay for it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Our escape is a show that was staged by forces far greater than our helper. I would like to know the price we will have to pay for it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Our escape is a show that was staged by forces far greater than our helper. I would like to know the price we will have to pay for it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Our escape is a show that was staged by forces far greater than our helper. I would like to know the price we will have to pay for it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我们的逃跑是一场表演，某种比我们的帮手强大得多的力量，协助我们上演了这出好戏。我很想知道，我们要为此付出什么样的代价。”
languages.original_text: "Our escape is a show that was staged by forces far greater than our helper. I would like to know the price we will have to pay for it."

traits.locale_text: “我们的逃跑是一场表演，某种比我们的帮手强大得多的力量，协助我们上演了这出好戏。我很想知道，我们要为此付出什么样的代价。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Notre évasion a été mise en scène par des puissances bien supérieures à celle de notre sauveur. Je m'inquiète de savoir combien elle va nous coûter... »
languages.original_text: "Our escape is a show that was staged by forces far greater than our helper. I would like to know the price we will have to pay for it."

traits.locale_text: « Notre évasion a été mise en scène par des puissances bien supérieures à celle de notre sauveur. Je m'inquiète de savoir combien elle va nous coûter... »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Nuestra huida es un espectáculo organizado por fuerzas muy superiores a nuestro ayudante. Me gustaría saber el precio que tendremos que pagar por ella».
languages.original_text: "Our escape is a show that was staged by forces far greater than our helper. I would like to know the price we will have to pay for it."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestra huida es un espectáculo organizado por fuerzas muy superiores a nuestro ayudante. Me gustaría saber el precio que tendremos que pagar por ella».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「私たちの脱出は見世物だ、演出を決めたのはこちらの協力者よりはるかに力を持つ者。脱出の代償は何なのか、知りたいものだ」
languages.original_text: "Our escape is a show that was staged by forces far greater than our helper. I would like to know the price we will have to pay for it."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの脱出は見世物だ、演出を決めたのはこちらの協力者よりはるかに力を持つ者。脱出の代償は何なのか、知りたいものだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Unsere Flucht ist ein Theater, das von weitaus größeren Mächten als unserem Helfer inszeniert wurde. Ich würde gerne wissen, welchen Preis wir dafür zahlen müssen."
languages.original_text: "Our escape is a show that was staged by forces far greater than our helper. I would like to know the price we will have to pay for it."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Flucht ist ein Theater, das von weitaus größeren Mächten als unserem Helfer inszeniert wurde. Ich würde gerne wissen, welchen Preis wir dafür zahlen müssen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Our escape is a show that was staged by forces far greater than our helper. I would like to know the price we will have to pay for it."

languages.text: "Kaçışımız, yardımcımızdan çok daha büyük güçler tarafından sahnelenen oyun. Uğruna ödemek zorunda kalacağımız bedel ne olacak acaba?.."
languages.original_text: "Our escape is a show that was staged by forces far greater than our helper. I would like to know the price we will have to pay for it."

traits.locale_text: "Kaçışımız, yardımcımızdan çok daha büyük güçler tarafından sahnelenen bir oyundu. Uğruna ödemek zorunda kalacağımız bedel ne olacak acaba."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
